021import net.tnemc.core.EconomyManager;
022import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify.HoldingsModifier;
026import net.tnemc.core.actions.ActionSource;
027import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.transaction.PostTransactionCallback;
028import net.tnemc.core.manager.TransactionManager;
029import net.tnemc.core.utils.exceptions.InvalidTransactionException;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
032
033import java.math.BigDecimal;
034import java.util.List;
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.UUID;
037import java.util.function.Consumer;
038
039/**
040 * Represents a financial transaction.
041 *
042 * @author creatorfromhell
043 * @since 0.1.2.0
044 */
045public class Transaction {
046
047  private TransactionProcessor processor;
048
049  private final String type;
050  private ActionSource source;
051
052  private TransactionParticipant from;
053  private TransactionParticipant to;
054  private HoldingsModifier modifierTo;
055  private HoldingsModifier modifierFrom;
056
057  private boolean admin;
058  private boolean track;
059
060  private Consumer<TransactionResult> resultConsumer;
061
062  public Transaction(final String type) {
063
064    this.type = type;
065
066    this.processor = EconomyManager.baseProcessor();
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Used to determine if the "to" participant is losing funds in this transaction.
071   *
072   * @return True if the "to" participant is losing funds, otherwise false.
073   */
074  public boolean isToLosing() {
075
076    return to != null && modifierTo != null && modifierTo.isRemoval();
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Used to determine if the "from" participant is losing funds in this transaction.
081   *
082   * @return True if the "from" participant is losing funds, otherwise false.
083   */
084  public boolean isFromLosing() {
085
086    return from != null && modifierFrom.isRemoval();
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Used to create a new Transaction object from the specified transaction type.
091   *
092   * @param type The identifier of the transaction type.
093   *
094   * @return An instance of the Transaction object created with the specified type.
095   */
096  public static Transaction of(final String type) {
097
098    return new Transaction(type);
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Used to set the {@link TransactionParticipant from} participant.
103   *
104   * @param id       The identifier of this participant.
105   * @param modifier The {@link HoldingsModifier modifier} associated with this participant.
106   *
107   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new participant.
108   */
109  public Transaction from(final UUID id, final HoldingsModifier modifier) {
110
111    final Optional<Account> account = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(id);
112    account.ifPresent(value->from(value, modifier));
113    return this;
114  }
115
116  /**
117   * Used to set the {@link TransactionParticipant from} participant.
118   *
119   * @param account  The account reference of this participant.
120   * @param modifier The {@link HoldingsModifier modifier} associated with this participant.
121   *
122   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new participant.
123   */
124  public Transaction from(final Account account, final HoldingsModifier modifier) {
125
126    final List<HoldingsEntry> balances = account.getHoldings(modifier.getRegion(), modifier.getCurrency(), modifier.getType());
127
128    if(balances.isEmpty()) {
129      balances.add(new HoldingsEntry(modifier.getRegion(), modifier.getCurrency(),
130                                     BigDecimal.ZERO, EconomyManager.NORMAL));
131    }
132
133    this.from = new TransactionParticipant(account.getIdentifier(), balances);
134
135    final Optional<TransactionType> type = TNECore.eco().transaction().findType(this.type);
136
137    final BigDecimal tax = (type.isPresent() && type.get().fromTax().isPresent())? type.get().fromTax().get()
138            .calculateTax(modifier.getModifier()) : BigDecimal.ZERO;
139
140    BigDecimal working = null;
141    final boolean take = (modifier.getModifier().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0);
142
143    if(take) {
144      if(modifier.isPercent()) {
145
146        BigDecimal total = BigDecimal.ZERO;
147        for(final HoldingsEntry entry : balances) {
148          total = total.add(entry.getAmount());
149        }
150        working = modifier.modify(total);
151        total = null;
152      } else {
153        working = modifier.getModifier().multiply(new BigDecimal(-1));
154      }
155    }
156
157    boolean done = false;
158
159    for(int i = 0; i < balances.size(); i++) {
160      final HoldingsEntry entry = balances.get(i);
161      final HoldingsEntry ending;
162
163      PluginCore.log().debug("entry bal: " + entry.getAmount().toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
164      PluginCore.log().debug("entry bal: " + entry.getRegion(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
165
166      if(!done) {
167        if(!take) {
168
169          ending = entry.modifyGrab(modifier).modifyGrab(tax.negate());
170
171          PluginCore.log().debug("End: " + ending.getAmount().toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
172          PluginCore.log().debug("End: " + ending.getRegion(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
173          done = true;
174        } else {
175
176          PluginCore.log().debug("Working: " + working.toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
177
178          if(entry.getAmount().compareTo(working) >= 0) {
179            PluginCore.log().debug("Value: " + working.toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
180
181            ending = entry.modifyGrab(working.multiply(new BigDecimal(-1))).modifyGrab(tax.negate());
182            PluginCore.log().debug("break out since we are good to go with this entry", DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
183            done = true;
184          } else {
185
186            if(i == (balances.size() - 1)) {
187              ending = entry.modifyGrab(working.multiply(new BigDecimal(-1)));
188
189            } else {
190              PluginCore.log().debug("Keep Working", DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
191              ending = entry.modifyGrab(entry.getAmount().multiply(new BigDecimal(-1)));
192              working = working.subtract(entry.getAmount());
193            }
194          }
195        }
196      } else {
197        ending = entry;
198      }
199      this.from.getEndingBalances().add(ending);
200    }
201
202    working = null;
203
204    this.from.setTax(tax);
205
206    this.modifierFrom = modifier;
207    return this;
208  }
209
210  /**
211   * Used to set the {@link TransactionParticipant to} participant.
212   *
213   * @param id       The identifier of this participant.
214   * @param modifier The {@link HoldingsModifier modifier} associated with this participant.
215   *
216   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new participant.
217   */
218  public Transaction to(final UUID id, final HoldingsModifier modifier) {
219
220    final Optional<Account> account = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(id);
221    account.ifPresent(value->to(value, modifier));
222    return this;
223  }
224
225  /**
226   * Used to set the {@link TransactionParticipant to} participant.
227   *
228   * @param account  The account reference of this participant.
229   * @param modifier The {@link HoldingsModifier modifier} associated with this participant.
230   *
231   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new participant.
232   */
233  public Transaction to(final Account account, final HoldingsModifier modifier) {
234
235    final List<HoldingsEntry> balances = account.getHoldings(modifier.getRegion(), modifier.getCurrency(), modifier.getType());
236
237    if(balances.isEmpty()) {
238      balances.add(new HoldingsEntry(modifier.getRegion(), modifier.getCurrency(),
239                                     BigDecimal.ZERO, EconomyManager.NORMAL));
240    }
241
242    this.to = new TransactionParticipant(account.getIdentifier(), balances);
243
244    final Optional<TransactionType> type = TNECore.eco().transaction().findType(this.type);
245
246    final BigDecimal tax = (type.isPresent() && type.get().toTax().isPresent())? type.get().toTax().get()
247            .calculateTax(modifier.getModifier()) : BigDecimal.ZERO;
248
249    BigDecimal working = null;
250    final boolean take = (modifier.getModifier().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0);
251
252    if(take) {
253      if(modifier.isPercent()) {
254
255        BigDecimal total = BigDecimal.ZERO;
256        for(final HoldingsEntry entry : balances) {
257          total = total.add(entry.getAmount());
258        }
259        working = modifier.modify(total);
260        total = null;
261      } else {
262        working = modifier.getModifier().multiply(new BigDecimal(-1));
263      }
264    }
265
266    boolean done = false;
267
268    for(int i = 0; i < balances.size(); i++) {
269      final HoldingsEntry entry = balances.get(i);
270      final HoldingsEntry ending;
271
272      PluginCore.log().debug("entry bal: " + entry.getAmount().toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
273      PluginCore.log().debug("entry bal: " + entry.getRegion(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
274
275      //TODO Test this.
276      if(done) break;
277
278      if(!done) {
279        if(!take) {
280
281          ending = entry.modifyGrab(modifier).modifyGrab(tax.negate());
282
283          PluginCore.log().debug("End: " + ending.getAmount().toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
284          PluginCore.log().debug("End: " + ending.getRegion(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
285          done = true;
286        } else {
287
288          PluginCore.log().debug("Working: " + working.toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
289
290          if(entry.getAmount().compareTo(working) >= 0) {
291            PluginCore.log().debug("Value: " + working.toPlainString(), DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
292
293            ending = entry.modifyGrab(working.multiply(new BigDecimal(-1))).modifyGrab(tax.negate());
294            PluginCore.log().debug("break out since we are good to go with this entry", DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
295            done = true;
296          } else {
297
298            if(i == (balances.size() - 1)) {
299              ending = entry.modifyGrab(working.multiply(new BigDecimal(-1)));
300
301            } else {
302              PluginCore.log().debug("Keep Working", DebugLevel.DEVELOPER);
303              ending = entry.modifyGrab(entry.getAmount().multiply(new BigDecimal(-1)));
304              working = working.subtract(entry.getAmount());
305            }
306          }
307        }
308      } else {
309        ending = entry;
310      }
311      this.to.getEndingBalances().add(ending);
312    }
313
314    working = null;
315
316    this.to.setTax(tax);
317
318    this.modifierTo = modifier;
319    return this;
320  }
321
322  /**
323   * Used to set {@link ActionSource source} of this transaction.
324   *
325   * @param source The {@link ActionSource source} of this transaction.
326   *
327   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new {@link ActionSource source}.
328   */
329  public Transaction source(final ActionSource source) {
330
331    this.source = source;
332    return this;
333  }
334
335  /**
336   * Used to set this as an administrator performed transaction. This allows it to override certain
337   * things such as account statuses.
338   *
339   * @param admin If this transaction is an administrator transaction or not.
340   *
341   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new {@link ActionSource source}.
342   */
343  public Transaction admin(final boolean admin) {
344
345    this.admin = admin;
346    return this;
347  }
348
349  /**
350   * Used to set {@link TransactionProcessor processor} of this transaction.
351   *
352   * @param processor The {@link TransactionProcessor processor} of this transaction.
353   *
354   * @return An instance of the Transaction object with the new
355   * {@link TransactionProcessor processor}.
356   */
357  public Transaction processor(final TransactionProcessor processor) {
358
359    this.processor = processor;
360    return this;
361  }
362
363  /**
364   * Processes the transaction and sends the result to the
365   * {@link Transaction#resultConsumer Result Handler}.
366   *
367   * @throws InvalidTransactionException If all required aspects of the transaction are not
368   *                                     present.
369   */
370  public void process(final Consumer<TransactionResult> resultConsumer) throws InvalidTransactionException {
371
372    this.resultConsumer = resultConsumer;
373
374    process();
375  }
376
377  /**
378   * Processes the transaction and sends the result to the
379   * {@link Transaction#resultConsumer Result Handler}.
380   *
381   * @throws InvalidTransactionException If all required aspects of the transaction are not
382   *                                     present.
383   */
384  public TransactionResult process() throws InvalidTransactionException {
385
386    String missing = null;
387
388    if(this.type == null) {
389      missing = "Transaction Type";
390    }
391
392    if(this.processor == null) {
393      missing = "Transaction Processor";
394    }
395
396    if(this.to == null && this.from == null) {
397      missing = "Both Transaction Parties";
398    }
399
400    if(missing != null) {
401      throw new InvalidTransactionException(missing);
402    }
403
404    final TransactionResult result = processor.process(this);
405
406    if(resultConsumer != null) {
407      resultConsumer.accept(result);
408    }
409
410    final PostTransactionCallback postTransaction = new PostTransactionCallback(result);
411    PluginCore.callbacks().call(postTransaction);
412
413    //Log our stuff.
414    if(result.getReceipt().isPresent()) {
415
416      TransactionManager.receipts().log(result.getReceipt().get());
417
418      if(to != null) {
419        to.asAccount().ifPresent((acc->acc.logReference(result.getReceipt().get())));
420      }
421
422      if(from != null) {
423        from.asAccount().ifPresent((acc->acc.logReference(result.getReceipt().get())));
424      }
425    }
426
427    return result;
428  }
429
430  public Optional<Account> getFromAccount() {
431
432    if(from != null) {
433      return TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(from.getId());
434    }
435
436    return Optional.empty();
437  }
438
439  public Optional<Account> getToAccount() {
440
441    if(to != null) {
442      return TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(to.getId());
443    }
444
445    return Optional.empty();
446  }
447
448  public TransactionProcessor getProcessor() {
449
450    return processor;
451  }
452
453  public String getType() {
454
455    return type;
456  }
457
458  public ActionSource getSource() {
459
460    return source;
461  }
462
463  public TransactionParticipant getFrom() {
464
465    return from;
466  }
467
468  public TransactionParticipant getTo() {
469
470    return to;
471  }
472
473  public HoldingsModifier getModifierTo() {
474
475    return modifierTo;
476  }
477
478  public HoldingsModifier getModifierFrom() {
479
480    return modifierFrom;
481  }
482
483  public boolean isAdmin() {
484
485    return admin;
486  }
487
488  public boolean isTrack() {
489
490    return track;
491  }
492
493  public void setTrack(final boolean track) {
494
495    this.track = track;
496  }
497
498  public Consumer<TransactionResult> getResultConsumer() {
499
500    return resultConsumer;
501  }
502}
